data.title: Research Institute on Food&Health Sciences
data.text:
Publications

Previous years

2019

In 2019, the Institute’s researchers have published 162 articles, of which 144 have been published in high-impact international journals (total impact factor of 780589 and an average impact factor per publication of 5.42), which is indicative of the Institute’s scientific excellence.
